name: vdv
description: A Chrome Extension can show the vector drawable when you open it

scripts.clean: find src -name "*.js" -print0|xargs -0 -I{} rm {} && find src -name "*.js.map" -print0|xargs -0 -I{} rm {}
scripts.browserify: [ ! -d bin ] && mkdir bin || browserify src/main.js > bin/main.js
scripts.compile: rm -r bin/* && npm run tsc && npm run browserify
scripts.release: [ $(grep 'const env' 'src/util/Logger.ts'|awk '$0=$5') = '"development";' ] && echo 'need to set env to production' 1>&2 && exit 1 || :; npm run compile && mkdir -p build/bin && cp manifest.json build/ && cp bin/main.js build/bin/ && zip -r $(grep 'version' manifest.json|awk '$0=$3'|sed -e 's/"//' -e 's/,/-release.zip/') build
